version_description:
1. New folder function
2. Fix the bug

1. New iPad support
2. New anti-shake shooting
3. Update the APP icon
4. Optimize the page jump logic
Emergency fix APP icon error

New document sorting function
Fix the bug

New batch export, batch copy
New image comparison gesture operation
New English, Japanese, French and other 8 recognition languages
Fix the problem of opening PDF file display and export
- the new UI

New picture editing
Support filters, brightness adjustment, special effects, rotation, text addition, cutting and other functions

1. Cancel the limit of the number of scans, and your friends can have unlimited number of scans!
2. New recycle bin function, no longer afraid of deleting files by mistake!
3. Add PDF merge function, support to combine multiple PDF documents into one, and automatic pagination.
4. Fix Shared text to WeChat failure problem.
5. Fix the occasional failure of the full selection function.

Added voice reading function
Added privacy policy and terms of use
Fixed text to PDF display scale exception

1. Add new merged text recognition documents
2. Add full-screen preview function

1. Fix the problem of full-screen button occlusion recognition
2.The UI streamlining
3.Enable new icon

Add batch text recognition
Add bulk generation PDF
Add secondary edit PDF
Fix bug with moving documents to nested folders
Fix bug with removing nested folder exceptions

1. Add image edge detection function, automatic edge cutting, remove messy background
2. Add automatic image correction function
3. Add magnifying glass function
4. Fixed the occasional failure of text recognition mode drag marquee

1. Added replacement of punctuation mark format
2. Increase scanning speed

1. Add the function of making certificates and photos
2. Add password setting function for PDF files
3. Add search and replace text function
4. Add 5 new filters
5. Add recycle bin to delete single files
Fix bug

Compatible with iPhone XS Max
Fix the bug

1. Fix the abnormal problem of saving pictures to album
2. Adjust the image editing interface
3. Internal logic optimization of App
